title: Intervention extraction in preclinical animal studies of Alzheimer's Disease: Enhancing regex performance with language model-based filtering

abstract: We explore different information extraction tools for annotation of interventions to support automated systematic reviews of preclinical AD animal studies. We compare two PICO (Population, Intervention, Comparison, and Outcome) extraction tools and …

title: Accuracy and transportability of machine learning models for adolescent suicide prediction with longitudinal clinical records

abstract: Abstract Machine Learning models trained from real-world data have demonstrated promise in predicting suicide attempts in adolescents. However, their transportability, namely the performance of a model trained on one dataset and applied to different …
